recipe.title: Chocolate-Strawberry Ganache
ingredients: 1 pound bittersweet (not unsweetened) or semisweet chocolate, chopped
instructions: Combine cream and jam in heavy large saucepan. Whisk over medium-high heat until jam melts and mixture comes to boil. Add chocolate, remove from heat and whisk until chocolate melts and mixture is smooth. Refrigerate ganache just until thick enough to spread, whisking occasionally, about 1 hour 15 minutes.
